PointOfInterest.Name: NCT Travel Centre
PointOfInterest.Description: NCT Travel Centre in the Old Market Square (NG1 2JS). .

FareZone.Name: easyrider "further" Zone
FareZone.Description: easyrider further zone (includes city area zone).

FareFrame.Name: Nottingham City Transport easyrider anyday products
FareFrame.Description:
A consecutive days travel card for frequent users: the cheapest way to travel on NCT.
Buy a week, or up to a year's worth of unlimited travel across the NCT network. The more you buy, the cheaper it is.

Notice.Text: To qualify for student discount, students must present (at the time of purchase) a valid photo ID issued by their college or university that shows a course expiry date on. NUS Extra and ISIC cards are not accepted. Travel can be purchased for use until the end of the academic year when the course ends.
Under 19 cards - proof of age required for first time issue. Travel can be purchased for use until 19th birthday.

On sale until Saturday 31 October 2020. Only one discounted student product (of any type) per individual student. Refunds for travel on these special academic products can only be made until 31 March 2021. In the event of lockdown restrictions re-occurring, NCT will offer refunds on portions of travel that could not be used. Refunds will be determined based on the nature of any restrictions.

UserProfile.Name: Student over 18
UserProfile.Description: To qualify for student discount, students must present (at the time of purchase) a valid photo ID issued by their college or university that shows a course expiry date on. NUS Extra and ISIC cards are not accepted. Travel can be purchased for use until the end of the academic year when the course ends

UserProfile.Name: Under 19
UserProfile.Description: Under 19 cards - proof of age required for first time issue. If you are Under 19, we require proof of your age. This can include a passport, birth certificate, driving licence, medical card or a letter from your school that confirms your date of birth.
UserProfile.ProofRequired: identityDocument passport birthCertificate passport medicalDocument drivingLicence

UserProfile.Name: Infant
UserProfile.Description: Up to three children under 5 years of age, accompanied by a fare paying adult or child passenger, and not occupying a seat, may travel free of charge on the Company 5day's services.
